guidedPaths.label: Oracle Storage Compute Service
guidedPaths.shortDesc: Enterprise-proven public cloud storage and archive service that supports your need for cloud-based data storage, sharing, and protection. Secure, resilient, elastic, and simple to use so your data is available when you need it from any environment connected to the Internet.
